metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. • In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and...
